title: What are some cleaning products that do more harm than good? - Quora

response.answer_text: Along with drain cleaners and toilet bowl cleaners, oven cleaners are considered one of the most dangerous cleaning options. Because oven cleaners contain corrosive chemicals, it can cause chemical burns to the eyes and skin, emit toxic fumes and harm the respiratory system.
It will not be in the market if it cannot pass a seal of approval if this cleaning product is not safe for use. What is the use of its effectivity if it is a hazard to one's health?
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Louie S. Lalic
